    echo "  skills              è¿è¡Œ Skills æµ‹è¯•"
    echo "  scenarios           è¿è¡Œç”¨æˆ·åœºæ™¯æµ‹è¯•"
    echo "  comprehensive       è¿è¡Œç»¼åˆæµ‹è¯•"
    echo ""

    echo "  $0 skills --headed           # æœ‰å¤´æ¨¡å¼è¿è¡Œ skills æµ‹è¯•"

# æ£€æŸ¥ä¾èµ–
check_dependencies() {

main() {

    local debug_mode=false

    # è§£æå‚æ•°
    while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
        case $1 in

                print_help
                exit 0
                ;;
            -u|--url)
                TEST_URL="$2"
                shift 2
                ;;
            -w|--workers)

            --debug)

            all|onboarding|skills|scenarios|comprehensive)

                ;;
            *)
                extra_args="$extra_args $1"
                shift
                ;;

    local test_pattern=""
    case $test_suite in
        onboarding)

            ;;
        skills)
            test_pattern="tests/e2e/skills.spec.ts"
            ;;
        scenarios)
            test_pattern="tests/e2e/user-scenarios.spec.ts"
            ;;
        comprehensive)
            test_pattern="tests/e2e/onboarding-comprehensive.spec.ts"
            ;;
        all|"")
            test_pattern=""
            ;;
    esac

    # è¿è¡Œæµ‹è¯•
    run_tests "$test_pattern" "$extra_args"
    local result=$?

    # æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ¥å‘Š
    show_report

    exit $result
}

main "$@"

#!/bin/bash
# Start API server and run tests

# cd /opt/vibelife/
# mkdir -p ~/logs

# cd /opt/vibelife/apps/api
# python3 -m venv venv
# source venv/bin/activate
# pip install --upgrade pip
# pip install -r requirements.txt

# cp /opt/vibelife/.env .

cd /opt/vibelife/apps/api
source .env

# æ³¨æ„: æ‰€æœ‰æ•æ„Ÿé…ç½®å¿…é¡»ä» .env æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–ï¼Œä¸è¦åœ¨æ­¤ç¡¬ç¼–ç 
# å¿…éœ€çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ (æ¥è‡ª .env):
#   - GLM_API_KEY
#   - VIBELIFE_DB_URL
# å¯é€‰çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡:
#   - VIBELIFE_API_PORT (é»˜è®¤ 8231)
#   - VIBELIFE_API_HOST (é»˜è®¤ 0.0.0.0)

# éªŒè¯å¿…éœ€çš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
if [ -z "$GLM_API_KEY" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: GLM_API_KEY not set. Please configure in .env file."
    exit 1
fi

if [ -z "$VIBELIFE_DB_URL" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: VIBELIFE_DB_URL not set. Please configure in .env file."
    exit 1
fi

# Kill any existing server
pkill -f "uvicorn main:app" 2>/dev/null || true
sleep 2

# Start server
echo "Starting API server..."
API_PORT=${VIBELIFE_API_PORT:-8231}
API_HOST=${VIBELIFE_API_HOST:-0.0.0.0}
LOG_DIR=${VIBELIFE_LOGS_ROOT:-/opt/vibelife/logs}

mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"
nohup python3 -m uvicorn main:app --host "$API_HOST" --port "$API_PORT" > "$LOG_DIR/vibelife_api.log" 2>&1 &
SERVER_PID=$!
echo "Server PID: $SERVER_PID"

# Wait for server to start
sleep 5

# Check if server is running
if ! kill -0 $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "Server failed to start. Log output:"
    cat /opt/vibelife/logs/vibelife_api.log
    exit 1
fi

# Test endpoints
echo ""
echo "Testing health endpoint..."
curl -s "http://localhost:${API_PORT}/health"

echo ""
echo "Testing chat/guest endpoint..."
curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:${API_PORT}/api/v1/chat/guest" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{"message": "ä½ å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³äº†è§£ä¸€ä¸‹å…«å­—", "skill": "bazi"}'

echo ""
echo "Server is running. Log:"
tail -20 "$LOG_DIR/vibelife_api.log"

# cp -rf /home/aiscend/.cache/vibelife/models /data/vibelife/
# chmod -R 777 /data/vibelife/

    61â†’    cd "$PROJECT_DIR/apps/api"
    62â†’
    63â†’    # ä½¿ç”¨ Python -m uvicorn æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ˆé¿å… shebang è·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ï¼‰
    64â†’    local PYTHON="/data/anaconda3/envs/ai/bin/python"

#!/bin/bash
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# VibeLife æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒå¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -e

SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_DIR="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
ENV_FILE="$PROJECT_DIR/.env"
LOG_DIR="/data/vibelife/logs/test"
PID_DIR="$PROJECT_DIR/.pids"

# é¢œè‰²è¾“å‡º
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${GREEN}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•ï¿½ï¿½â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}  VibeLife æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒå¯åŠ¨${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"

# æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
if [ ! -f "$ENV_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${RED}é”™è¯¯: æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ $ENV_FILE${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# åˆ›å»ºå¿…è¦ç›®å½•
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR" "$PID_DIR"

# åŠ è½½ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
set -a
source "$ENV_FILE"
set +a

# æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒç«¯å£è¦†ç›–
export VIBELIFE_API_PORT=8100
export VIBELIFE_ENV=development

# æ£€æŸ¥ç«¯å£æ˜¯å¦è¢«å ç”¨
check_port() {
    local port=$1
    if lsof -i :$port > /dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}è­¦å‘Š: ç«¯å£ $port å·²è¢«å ç”¨${NC}"
        return 1
    fi
    return 0
}

# å¯åŠ¨ API æœåŠ¡
start_api() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}å¯åŠ¨ API æœåŠ¡ (ç«¯å£ $VIBELIFE_API_PORT)...${NC}"

    if ! check_port $VIBELIFE_API_PORT; then
        echo -e "${RED}API ç«¯å£å·²è¢«å ç”¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡å¯åŠ¨${NC}"
        return 1
    fi

    cd "$PROJECT_DIR/apps/api"

    # ä½¿ç”¨ Python -m uvicorn æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ˆé¿å… shebang è·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ï¼‰
    local PYTHON="/data/anaconda3/envs/ai/bin/python"
    if [ ! -f "$PYTHON" ]; then
        PYTHON="python3"
    fi

    nohup "$PYTHON" -m uvicorn main:app \
        --host 0.0.0.0 \
        --port $VIBELIFE_API_PORT \
        --reload \
        > "$LOG_DIR/api.log" 2>&1 &

    echo $! > "$PID_DIR/api.pid"
    echo -e "${GREEN}API æœåŠ¡å·²å¯åŠ¨ (PID: $!)${NC}"
}

# å¯åŠ¨ Web æœåŠ¡
start_web() {
    local WEB_PORT=8232
    echo -e "${YELLOW}å¯åŠ¨ Web æœåŠ¡ (ç«¯å£ $WEB_PORT)...${NC}"

    if ! check_port $WEB_PORT; then
        echo -e "${RED}Web ç«¯å£å·²è¢«å ç”¨ï¼Œè·³è¿‡å¯åŠ¨${NC}"
        return 1
    fi

    cd "$PROJECT_DIR/apps/web"

    # åˆ›å»º .env.local ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒ
    cat > .env.local << EOF
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://106.37.170.238:$VIBELIFE_API_PORT
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE=http://106.37.170.238:$VIBELIFE_API_PORT/api/v1
NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=ws://106.37.170.238:$VIBELIFE_API_PORT/ws
VIBELIFE_API_INTERNAL=http://127.0.0.1:$VIBELIFE_API_PORT
EOF

    nohup pnpm dev --port $WEB_PORT --hostname 0.0.0.0 \
        > "$LOG_DIR/web.log" 2>&1 &

    echo $! > "$PID_DIR/web.pid"
    echo -e "${GREEN}Web æœåŠ¡å·²å¯åŠ¨ (PID: $!)${NC}"
}

# ä¸»æµç¨‹
main() {
    start_api
    sleep 2
    start_web

    echo ""
    echo -e "${GREEN}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}  æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒå¯åŠ¨å®Œæˆ${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "  API:  http://106.37.170.238:$VIBELIFE_API_PORT"
    echo -e "  Web:  http://106.37.170.238:8232"
    echo ""
    echo -e "  æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•: $LOG_DIR"
    echo -e "  åœæ­¢å‘½ä»¤: $SCRIPT_DIR/stop-test.sh"
    echo ""
}

main "$@"
